role.descr: divided among/between, if separate from arg0

example.name: autogen1
example.text: the Pentagon 's proposed split of 60-40 between domestic and foreign bases

example.name: autogen2
example.text: a split between the internal and external wings of the ANC and between the newly freed leaders and those activists who have emerged as leaders inside the country during their imprisonment
example.arg: between the internal and external wings of the ANC and between the newly freed leaders and those activists who have emerged as leaders inside the country during their imprisonment
